item.title: After Effects Tips and Tricks
item.description: ? To replace a layer with another footage from media binary ~ Alt + Drag over selected layer.

item.title: Git Basics
item.description: Start Check Version git --version Get help git --help Initialize a local repository 1 2 3 4 cd ~/Desktop/git-demo-example git init To add files to staging area 1 2 3 4 5 6 git add a.
